title: CLASSIFICATION: WINNING IN LARCO LABOR CARE!
content:
All on Thursday 28/4 at 5:00 pm in the Constitution,
In the concentration of LARCO ASSOCIATIONS


NO to redundancies and the outbreak!

KEEPING ALL WORK POSITIONS
AND ALL OF RIGHTS!


THE Class course expresses its solidarity in the struggle given by LARCO employees and their families for the right to work and life.

It is a fight they have been waging for years againstLARCO's deliberate depreciation and sale process,both by the ND government and from the previous ones (SYRIZA, PASOK etc.). This approach is that has led LARCO to be For two years off, in a 'special management' regime and her workers waiting with constant extensions.

Now, 850 workers are in danger of being on the road as on March 31 expire their contracts and no one is committed to what will they get off.
This development will have tragic consequences not only for workers and their families, but also for all the surrounding area. How will they live? Where will they stay? How will they pay the loans? How Will their children study?

These questions are asked by the reality and with mass struggle they must be answered.

Struggle to maintain all jobs and all labor rights.

AgainstIn Hostage of workers, defeatism, terrorism and blackmail to accept the deterioration of working conditions for his own sake any "investor-savior".

AgainstIn hunger programs of DBA (formerly OAED) which is raw mockery for workers and They aim to disorient them and eventually get rid of them.

Againstto Anti-labor-Antilaular Policy that behind the talk about 'Development' hides the black reality of poverty, unemployment and desolation. Is the same policy that left their fate Thousands of fields in Thessaly after the devastating floods.

Mass and unyielding struggle for the right to full and stable work, with decent wages and working conditions, and all safety measures.
THE LARCO employees' power is in the massage and Scaling their fight! The support and solidarity by the people and the The world of work is important and must be given!

THE Righteous struggle of LARCO workers is a race of all working class and as such should be supported by the whole workers.

CLASS
